entry.title: https://github.com/VSCodium/vscodium
entry.content: binary releases of VS Code without MS branding/telemetry/licensing

entry.title: https://github.com/MichaelCade/90DaysOfDevOps
entry.content: This repository started out as a learning in public project for myself and has now become a structured learning map for many in the community. We have 3 years under our belt covering all things DevOps, including Principles, Processes, Tooling and Use Cases surrounding this vast topic.

entry.title: https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite
entry.content: Bazzite is a cloud native image built upon Fedora Atomic Desktops that brings the best of Linux gaming to all of your devices - including your favorite handheld.

entry.title: https://github.com/LinuxDroidMaster/Termux-Desktops
entry.content: Collection of scripts to launch Desktops with audio in Termux X11 and how to use hardware acceleration

entry.title: https://github.com/edoardottt/awesome-hacker-search-engines
entry.content: A curated list of awesome search engines useful during Penetration testing, Vulnerability assessments, Red/Blue Team operations, Bug Bounty and more

entry.title: https://github.com/wolfi-dev/os
entry.content: Main package repository for production Wolfi images

entry.title: https://github.com/chaifeng/ufw-docker
entry.content: To fix the Docker and UFW security flaw without disabling iptables

entry.title: https://github.com/InfinityLoop1308/PipePipe
entry.content: A FLOSS Android app to let you browse YouTube, NicoNico and BiliBili freely.

entry.title: https://github.com/WhatsApp/proxy
entry.content: This repository contains the WhatsApp proxy implementation for users to host their own proxy infrastructure to connect to WhatsApp for chat (VoIP is not currently supported)

entry.title: https://github.com/sonic2kk/steamtinkerlaunch
entry.content: Linux wrapper tool for use with the Steam client for custom launch options and 3rd party programs

entry.title: https://github.com/raspberrypi/rpi-eeprom
entry.content: Installation scripts and binaries for the Raspberry Pi 4 and Raspberry Pi 5 bootloader EEPROMs

entry.title: https://github.com/ohmybash/oh-my-bash
entry.content: A delightful community-driven framework for managing your bash configuration, and an auto-update tool so that makes it easy to keep up with the latest updates from the community.
